TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 19
TEI.2.document_title: J. C. Payton to Stephen F Austin, 02-22-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with J. C. Peyton, February 22. 1828. Bill and price list
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 19

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with J. C. Peyton, February 22. 1828. Bill and price list*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felepe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* in a/c *person_mentioned*J. C. Peyton*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-02-1827">2nd May 1827*/date_mentioned* 4 lbs sugear by *person_mentioned*Mrs. Picket*/person_mentioned*___ $1.00*/p*
*p*1 doz Candéis___________Do________ 50*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-21-1827">21st June_*/date_mentioned*__25 lbs Flour by Do------------------- 2.50*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="02-22-1828">22nd Febuay 1828*/date_mentioned* by subscription to Ball------------ 2.00*/p*
*p*By *person_mentioned*M. M. Battle*/person_mentioned*------- 37.00*/p*
*p*$43.00*/p* *p*Recd payt by a credit on my note *date_mentioned n="06-10-1828">June 10, 1828*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. C. Payton*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
